title: Super high ping..
body: I've been having this annoying, crappy high ping for about 2 weeks or something, starting March 20th, it normally just lasts a few minutes but now its been 2 weeks and goes until the end of the day -_- not sure what i am to do..

replies.body: It sucks that you've had to deal with that for so long, and it does sound like your network might have some instabilities.  Specifically, your connection itself or even how your ISP is reaching us might be causing some of these spikes.  My suggestion in this case would be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Test it in a custom game and let me know how it goes.
